<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=5904) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 97 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Blessed One](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=51) (Level 10), [Blessed One](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=242) (Level 10)

**Prerequisites**
[Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=5897)

</column>

---

Your faith enhances your ability to remove conditions. Add the following options to the list of conditions you can [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) for any type of mercy you can grant. **Mercy of the Body** [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=68), [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92); if you're 16th level, add [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=93); **Mercy of Grace** [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=81), [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90), slowed; if you're 12th level, add [petrified](/Conditions.aspx?ID=87); if you're 16th level, add stunned; **Mercy of the Mind** [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=63), [controlled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=64), slowed; if you're 16th level, add [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=67) and stunned.
